text: Ana María Giunta (1 March 1943 - 14 March 2015) was an Argentine actress. She was known for her roles in S.O.S Gulubú (1986), A King and His Movie (1986), and in Eversmile, New Jersey (1989). Giunta was born in Concepción del Uruguay, Argentina. Giunta died in Buenos Aires, Argentina from respiratory failure, aged 72.Murió Ana María Giunta ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1943 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Argentine movie actors Category:Argentine television actors Category:Deaths from respiratory failure Category:Disease-related deaths in Argentina
title: Ana María Giunta
